name: Micol Padoan
subtitle: Country Marketing Manager at HP
about: Highly motivated and passionate marketing manager, with international background. Fluent in Italian, English and Spanish, with 10 years of work experience in multinational environments, in marketing, sales and project management roles across different locations. Areas of interest: marketing and communication, digital marketing, digital strategy, search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC), social media, display advertising, performance marketing, programmatic, web analytics, marketing automation and CRM, email marketing, personalization, CX, UX. Soft Skills: rapid learning, highly adaptable, very responsible, cooperative, love working in teams, activator, arranger, always calm and reassuring, I rarely stressed out :)I have a Double Degree and a Master in International Management (CEMS) and international experience living abroad in Canada (1 year), Russia (1 year) and Spain (6 years) - working for HP.
experiences: Country Marketing Manager Large Format Printing Business

Achieving quota goals through innovative B2B and B2C marketing activities, primarily targeted to drive awareness, consideration and preference to our products, nurturing lead generation, funnel migration, advocacy and final purchase metrics. Digital marketing transformation lead, managing search engine optimization, pay-per-click, display advertising, programmatic, social media campaigns, web analytics, marketing automation, CRM and email marketing.

Main liaison with industry associations, end-customers success stories activities, partners/resellers marketing activities, PR and media publishers, schools and public entities.

Work as lead in the EMEA region (Europe, Middle East and Africa) providing the strategy for our channel partners marketing strategy, with marketing mix and marketing communications tools to achieve the segment business objectives. 

Project lead of main HP Channel Events: Singapore, Abu Dhabi, Scotland. 
Coordinator of sales trainings, local events, industry tradeshows, demo days, open houses and incentive activities. Owner of ROMI and reporting processes to all EMEA stakeholders.

Own end-to-end marketing campaigns for EMEA region: concept, coordination of creative development, campaign setup, segment definition, implementation and A/B testing, taking responsibility of the entire customer journey and advocacy of users.

Manager of our internal telemarketing team, 11 people with outbound and inbound roles.
Development of a geographical-expansion model into an emerging country, in addition to a deep analysis of product diversification possibilities in the consolidated markets.

This is a secret personal dream come true… I’m very excited to share with you my first book: Finding Yourself at Work. A Corporate Survival Guide.Within the pages of books, whether essays, novels, or non-fiction, I've always found my serenity and inspiration. Deep within, I've always had a desire to become an author, but the fear of facing a blank page and not knowing where to go from there held me back... until now!Blending insights from neuroscience, philosophy, psychology, mindfulness and hands-on exercises, I've written this book with one goal in mind: to empower you to make positive change in your work and life.This has been a real passion project, diving into the personal experiences, challenges, and victories in the professional world that so many of us share. May this book find you at the right moment of receptivity, enabling you to make work a more enriching experience for you and creating a positive impact in the organizations we are part of.I will be donating 10% of all sales to The Life You Can Save, a nonprofit organization dedicated to combating extreme poverty by supporting effective charities and evaluating their impact.“All of us are perfect the way we are. And we could all be a bit better”You can buy the book here:🤚🏻https://amzn.eu/d/f7sQkb8

Sharing an innovative customer story coming out of Italy! For more than 30 years, Tecnoplex Srl has been responsible for the creation of durable point of sales and advertising displays for brands and companies. The company's goal has always been to meet the needs of its customers in terms of digital printing, and provide customised products that combine creativity, speed, and freedom – all while incorporating sustainable business practices. Empowered by HP Latex R1000, they were able to do just that and exemplify how technology drives business evolution. Their story teaches us that a sustainable approach to digital printing enhances not just productivity but customer satisfaction. I was especially excited to see how committed Tecnoplex Srl was to champion a circular economy, something that I’ve been a big proponent of for HP. They’ve set the standards of how businesses can incorporate sustainability into their business model. Read more here: https://bit.ly/48RnoHr.  hashtag#CustomerSuccess hashtag#SustainableInnovation hashtag#LargeFormatPrint
